Controlled horizontal stepper.

```js
class StepperExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      steps: [
        { label: "Select campaign settings", completed: false },
        { label: "Create an ad group", completed: false },
        { label: "Create an ad", completed: false }
      ],
      activeStep: 0
    };
    this.handleBack = this.handleBack.bind(this);
    this.handleNext = this.handleNext.bind(this);
    this.handleFinish = this.handleFinish.bind(this);
    this.handleReset = this.handleReset.bind(this);
  }

  handleBack() {
    this.setState(state => ({
      activeStep: state.activeStep - 1,
      steps: state.steps.map(
        (step, index) =>
          index === state.activeStep - 1 ? { ...step, completed: false } : step
      )
    }));
  }

  handleNext() {
    this.setState(state => ({
      activeStep: state.activeStep + 1,
      steps: state.steps.map(
        (step, index) =>
          index === state.activeStep ? { ...step, completed: true } : step
      )
    }));
  }

  handleFinish() {
    this.setState(state => ({
      activeStep: state.steps.length - 1,
      steps: state.steps.map(step => ({
        ...step,
        completed: true
      }))
    }));
  }

  handleReset() {
    this.setState(state => ({
      activeStep: 0,
      steps: state.steps.map(step => ({
        ...step,
        completed: false
      }))
    }));
  }

  render() {
    const styles = {
      buttonContainer: {
        marginTop: 20
      },
      button: {
        marginRight: 8
      }
    };
    const { steps, activeStep } = this.state;

    const finished = () =>
      steps.filter(step => step.completed).length === steps.length;

    return (
      <div style={{ backgroundColor: "#f5f5f5", padding: 16 }}>
        <Stepper>
          {steps.map((step, index) => {
            return (
              <React.Fragment key={index}>
                <Step inactive={index > activeStep}>
                  {step.completed ? (
                    <StepIconCompleted />
                  ) : (
                    <StepIcon>{index + 1}</StepIcon>
                  )}
                  <StepLabel>{step.label}</StepLabel>
                </Step>
                {index < steps.length - 1 && <StepDivider />}
              </React.Fragment>
            );
          })}
        </Stepper>

        <div style={styles.buttonContainer}>
          <div style={{ display: finished() ? "none" : undefined }}>
            <Button
              style={styles.button}
              disabled={activeStep === 0}
              onClick={this.handleBack}
            >
              Back
            </Button>

            <Button
              style={styles.button}
              disabled={activeStep === steps.length - 1}
              onClick={this.handleNext}
            >
              Next
            </Button>

            <Button
              raised
              primary
              style={styles.button}
              onClick={this.handleFinish}
            >
              Finish
            </Button>
          </div>

          <Button
            style={{ display: finished() ? undefined : "none" }}
            onClick={this.handleReset}
          >
            Reset
          </Button>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }
}

<StepperExample />;
```
